item.title: [EU][Collaborative solutions] - MXPlan Exchange migration
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 26, 10:15 UTC  -  Sep 8, 10:20 UTC

Jul 19, 21:07 UTC

Start time : 26/07/2024 10:15 UTC
End time : 08/09/2024 10:20 UTC

No action is required from the customers.
For further information, please find attached a link to the FAQ: https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/fr-mx-plan-zimbra-faq?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0061410

item.title: [GRA7][WebPaaS] - Routine accounts maintenance
item.description:
Jul 22, 03:01 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jul 22, 03:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jul 18, 13:28 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 22/07/2024 03:00 UTC
End time : 22/07/2024 04:00 UTC
Service impact : All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade. Our partner will be performing a routine maintenance to release the latest features, bug fixes and performance updates.This will impact at one point, a short downtime of no more than 10 minutes. Integrations and webhooks may fail during the maintenance, and you may notice increased deployment times.
Service improvement : Our partner communicated to OVHCloud that they will be doing a routine maintenance on account service.

Service impact : All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade. Our partner will be performing a routine maintenance to optimize performance service on Accounts. This maintenance is expected to impact performance for Accounts services, including the Console, User Accounting, Provisioning and Billing, although, services will remain available at all times.
Service improvement : Our partner communicated to OVHCloud that they will be doing a routine maintenance on account service. This maintenance is expected to not have impact on the projects: no downtime, no performance issue are expected.

item.title: [FR][Web Cloud] - OverTheBox incident notification
item.description:
Jul 17, 14:54 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 17/07/2024 13:28 UTC
End time : 17/07/2024 14:47 UTC
Service impact : Perturbations were observed on OverTheBox.
If the OverTheBox dedicated IP address is lost, the service will continue to work with a connection from one of the configured interfaces.
Root cause : Software issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jul 17, 14:05 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 17/07/2024 13:28 UTC
Service impact : Perturbations are being observed on OverTheBox.
If the OverTheBox dedicated IP address is lost, the service will continue to work with a connection from one of the configured interfaces.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
